name: Crystal Caverns 2
description:
Dive deep into 3 caverns full of loot and dangerous hazards. Navigate pools of toxic sludge, spike traps and marauding nasties. Find secrets and collect crystals and power ups.

Controls
move - ARROW KEYS
jump - X
throw boomerang - C
quit game - Q

Note: boomerangs can be shot vertically up and diagonally up as well as horizontally.

Follow me on Twitter
